ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | mat0dim.a | |- A = ( (/) Mat R ) |
| 2 |  | #P_0fin | |- (/) e. Fin |
| 3 | 1 | #P_matring | |- ( ( (/) e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) -> A e. Ring ) |
| 4 | 2, 3 | #P_mpan | |- ( R e. Ring -> A e. Ring ) |
| 5 |  | #P_ringgrp | |- ( A e. Ring -> A e. Grp ) |
| 6 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` A ) = ( Base ` A ) |
| 7 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( 0g ` A ) = ( 0g ` A ) |
| 8 | 6, 7 | #P_grpidcl | |- ( A e. Grp -> ( 0g ` A ) e. ( Base ` A ) ) |
| 9 | 4, 5, 8 | #P_3syl | |- ( R e. Ring -> ( 0g ` A ) e. ( Base ` A ) ) |
| 10 | 1 | #P_fveq2i | |- ( Base ` A ) = ( Base ` ( (/) Mat R ) ) |
| 11 |  | #P_mat0dimbas0 | |- ( R e. Ring -> ( Base ` ( (/) Mat R ) ) = { (/) } ) |
| 12 | 10, 11 | #P_syl5eq | |- ( R e. Ring -> ( Base ` A ) = { (/) } ) |
| 13 | 12 | #P_eleq2d | |- ( R e. Ring -> ( ( 0g ` A ) e. ( Base ` A ) <-> ( 0g ` A ) e. { (/) } ) ) |
| 14 |  | #P_elsni | |- ( ( 0g ` A ) e. { (/) } -> ( 0g ` A ) = (/) ) |
| 15 | 13, 14 | #P_syl6bi | |- ( R e. Ring -> ( ( 0g ` A ) e. ( Base ` A ) -> ( 0g ` A ) = (/) ) ) |
| 16 | 9, 15 | #P_mpd | |- ( R e. Ring -> ( 0g ` A ) = (/) ) |
